statements: DELETE FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 101 AND assessment_name = 'Midterm Exam';
DELETE FROM student_grades WHERE assessment_name = 'Final Exam' AND grade < 70;
DELETE FROM student_grades WHERE evaluation_date < '2022-01-01' AND student_id = 101;
DELETE FROM StudentGrades WHERE student_id = 100 AND course_id = 1;
DELETE FROM PerformanceData WHERE performance_score > 90 AND performance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM assessments WHERE score < 60 AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM assessments WHERE subject = 'Math' AND score > 90;
